```{r setup}
library(tidyplots)
```

```{r}

# test function factories

study %>%
  tidyplot(treatment, score, color = treatment) %>%
  add_error() %>%
  add_sd() %>% 
  add_range() %>% 
  add_ci95()

study %>%
  tidyplot(treatment, score) %>%
  add_error_ribbon() %>%
  add_sd_ribbon() %>% 
  add_range_ribbon() %>% 
  add_ci95_ribbon()

study %>%
  tidyplot(treatment, score) %>%
  add_mean_bar(alpha = 0.3) %>% 
  add_mean_dash() %>% 
  add_mean_dot() %>% 
  add_mean_value() %>% 
  add_mean_line()

study %>%
  tidyplot(treatment, score) %>%
  add_median_bar(alpha = 0.3) %>% 
  add_median_dash() %>% 
  add_median_dot() %>% 
  add_median_value() %>% 
  add_median_line()

study %>%
  tidyplot(treatment, score) %>%
  add_sum_bar(alpha = 0.3) %>% 
  add_sum_dash() %>% 
  add_sum_dot() %>% 
  add_sum_value() %>% 
  add_sum_line()

study %>%
  tidyplot(treatment) %>%
  add_count_bar(alpha = 0.3) %>% 
  add_count_dash() %>% 
  add_count_dot() %>% 
  add_count_value() %>% 
  add_count_line()

#
```
